inclusion.criterion: vaginal or caesarean delivery and are feeling well
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: first time mothers to avoid confounding variables due to previous positive or negative experiences from expressing milk
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mothers will intend to breastfeed and are planning to pump milk on site in the NICU at least once/day and will be recruited 7-10 days postpartum
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: survival as determined by the attending physician
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: mothers who have been diagnosed with mastitis will not be recruited for the study
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: 41-year-old obese woman coming to the emergency room with abdominal pain and vomiting. Abdominal CT scan revealed acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis with enlarged common bile duct and intrahepatic duct confirming gall stone pancreatitis.
